item.title: Another question
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok for my clan system, how would i make it so that if someone in the zamorak clan kills somone in the sardomin, or guthix, they get a point? im thinking something like this but im not really sure

if ((playerIsInZamorakClan = true) && playerKills (playerIsInSaradominClan)) { zamorakClanPoints += 1; }

that doesnt seem right to me but i dont know. any help?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2007, 05:54:10 PM[/size][hr]HELLO?!?!?!!?!? CAN ANYONE HELP?!?!?!?!?!?!?!!?!?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2007, 07:27:47 PM[/size][hr]OMFG PLEASE SOMONE HELP WTF DO I HAVE TO DO TO GET AN ANSWER?!?!?!?!!?!?!??!!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?
